fixes.name: Profit per year
fixes.dax_expression:
CALCULATE(
    SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Profit]),
    ALLEXCEPT(
        'CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)',
        'CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Year]
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the FIXED LOD aggregation {FIXED [Year] : SUM([Profit])} to a DAX measure that calculates SUM of Profit while preserving filters only on the Year calculated column. The Tableau calculated field Year (YEAR([Date])) is referenced as 'CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Year].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD aggregation which is context/aggregate-based; such calculations should be implemented as measures in Power BI.
